author: waredjeb
body:
This PR fixes the grouping of the scores plots for the HGCAL Validation, adding them back to the set of plots obtained through `makeHGCalValidationPlots` script.

Tested locally:

Pre-fix: https://wredjeb.web.cern.ch/HGCAL/ScoreStudies/plotsComparison/plots1_Trackster%20to%20SimTracksters%20from%20CP%20Associated%20by%20Hits.html (no score-only plots present)
Post-fix: https://wredjeb.web.cern.ch/HGCAL/ScoreStudies/plotsComparison2/plots1_Trackster%20to%20SimTracksters%20from%20CP%20Associated%20by%20Hits.html 


@felicepantaleo FYI
title: Add score plots back in HGCAL Validation
